string-array.name: faqArray
string-array.item: FAQ
Home Page
1. Here you can view in a glance of what you have worn in the month.
2. To Add photos: click on the first icon from the bottom menu bar.
3. To view List of Friends: Click on the second icon.
4. To play around with Color Combi: Click on the third icon.
5. To view Fashion Spread: Click on the forth icon.
Add Picture
1. Date will be current date by default. To change, click on the "Pick Date" button to change the date.
2. Type the description of the photo.
3. Click on the "Choose Picture" button to select the picture to be uploaded.
4. Click on "Add" to add it to the calendar.
Friends List
1. Top List are people who are requesting to be your friend.
2. To accept click on the "green tick icon".
3. A confirmation message will be prompted before it will be process.
4. To decline click on the "red cross icon".
5. A confirmation message will be prompted before it will be process.
1. Bottom List are the list of your friends.
2. You can remove friends by clicking on the "red cross icon".
3. A confirmation message will be prompted before it will be process.
Add Friend
1. Key in the email of the person you are inviting.
2. Click on "Invite" to send request.
Color Combi
1. Here you can play around with colours for tops and bottoms.
2. Select a Top and Bottom from the side menu.
3. Click on the Top and a color picker will pop out for you to choose.
4. Click on the Bottom and a color picker will pop out for you to choose.
5. Save your project to the gallery by clicking on the first icon on the side menu.
6. View the gallery by clicking on the second icon on the side menu.
Fashion Spread
1. Here you can view the timeline of shares from your friends and also from you.
2. Click on "Timeline" tab to view shares by your friends.
3. Click on "My Shares" tab to view your shares.
Fashion Spread - Timeline
1. You can rate your friends photo by clicking on the "Heart" and "Upside down heart" icon.
2. "Heart" icon represents Fashy which means you like it.
3. "Upside down heart" icon represents Tacky which means you dislike it.
